name: Chicken Chimi in the Oven
author: Jeri Zieman
summary: A fragrant, spicy chicken mixture is rolled up in flour tortillas and baked. This is my absolute favorite recipe! Serve with salsa, sour cream, and guacamole.
ingredients: 1 pound cooked, shredded chicken breast meat
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Lightly grease a medium baking dish
Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large saucepan over medium heat
Saute onion and garlic in oil until tender
Season with chili powder, cumin, and cinnamon
Transfer the mixture to a blender or food processor, and blend until smooth
Return mixture to the saucepan, stir in the chicken, and cook until heated through
Spoon an equal amount of refried beans down center of each tortilla, and top with equal amounts of the chicken mixture
Fold tortillas over the filling, and secure with toothpicks
Arrange seam-side down in the prepared baking dish, and brush with the remaining olive oil
Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven, turning every 5 minutes, until golden brown and crisp
